name: The Fairy Tale of Holy Knight Ricca: Two Winged Sisters
name_original: The Fairy Tale of Holy Knight Ricca: Two Winged Sisters
description:
The holy sunlight, illuminating those who live on earth...
The stronger that light is...
The brighter it shines...

The denser the darkness becomes...
The farther the shadows fall...

Two lonely sisters, one chosen by God, the other transformed into a demon..
A fairy tale about their wicked fate adorned with lust and obscenity...

The younger of the two, Ricca, is endowed with the power to transform
into a holy knight, and sets off on a journey in search of her abducted sister.

Conquer the powerful monsters that stand in the holy knight's way
through a wide range of combat actions!
